## Trying 1

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(palmerpenguins)

iris2 <- ggplot(iris, aes(x=Petal.Length, y=Petal.Width)) +
  geom_point()

cars <- ggplot(mtcars, aes(x=hp, y=mpg)) + geom_point(size=3)

mass_hist <- ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = body_mass_g)) + geom_histogram(aes(fill = species), alpha = 0.5, position = "identity") + scale_fill_manual(values = c("darkorange","purple","cyan4")) + labs(x = "Body mass (g)", y = "Frequency", title = "Penguin body mass") 

iris2
```
